name: Draconic Suppression
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Dragonslayer's Handbook © 2013, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: A dragon that fails its saving throw cannot use its breath weapon for the duration of the spell and is treated as one age category younger for determining which special abilities it can use. For example, an ancient green dragon would revert to the special abilities of a very old dragon and lose access to its miasma ability and its dominate person spell-like ability. This spell has no effect on a dragon's armor class, feats, frightful presence, hit points, physical attacks, saving throws, senses, size, skills, spellcasting, or statistics.
text_zh: 一条龙如果在对抗此法术的豁免中失败，则在法术持续时间内无法使用他的喷吐武器并且在他使用特殊能力时年龄层视为年轻了一级。例如，一条古绿龙会因此在使用特殊能力时被视为极老龙从而失去瘴气能力和支配人类类法术能力。这个法术不对龙的防御等级，专长，气势凶猛，生命值，物理攻击，豁免，感知，体型，技能，施法和属性数据造成影响。 译注：原文在「范围」项，写的是25呎+5呎/等级，应是官方印刷错误，已更正。
